title: Chasuble Fragments, mid-18th century
medium: Silk compound cloth with metal, brocaded
description: Fragments of  chasuble, brocaded with silver lace trimming with serpentining form with lacy filling and leaves, in white on coral ground.  Flowers and buds in silver wound on white silk core, outlined in green.  Silver trimming down each seam.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chasuble Fragments, mid-18th century.
mid-18th century. Silk compound cloth with metal, brocaded. Gift of Rodman A. Heeren. 1960-151-5-a,b.
